main module¶

The main app file that contains the instantiation of the beer game app and all the endpoints of the app

main.before_request()¶
main.choose_roles()¶

Homepage for choosing roles

main.create_game()¶

Create individual games backend

main.create_instructor()¶

Create a instructor via query string parameters.

main.create_student()¶

Create a instructor via query string parameters.

main.delete_game(game_id)¶

Delete a specific game

main.game_creation()¶

Game creation frontend

main.game_instructions()¶

Frontend for the instructions of the game

main.game_screen(game_id)¶

Frontend for the Game Screen

main.home()¶

Homepage

main.instructor()¶

Homepage for the instructor

main.instructor_dashboard()¶

If the instructor is not logged in, redirect to login

main.instructor_login()¶
main.instructor_login_check()¶

Password check for instructor backend

main.instructor_logout()¶

Instructor logout

main.instructor_register()¶

Register an instructor frontend

main.reset_game(game_id)¶

Reset a specific game

main.reset_games()¶

Reset all games

main.student_about()¶

Register an instructor frontend

main.student_dashboard()¶
main.student_login()¶
main.student_login_check()¶

Password check for student/player backend

main.student_logout()¶

Student logout

main.updateDB()¶

Updates the database with the submitted values by the player each round

main.update_game(game_id)¶

Update game method

main.update_specific_game()¶

Update specific game method
